statements: UPDATE AdHocReports SET report_title = 'Monthly Sales Report' WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ad_hoc_reports SET report_name = 'Updated Report 1' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE report_metrics SET metric_value = 100.00, metric_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE metric_id = 5;
UPDATE ad_hoc_reports SET report_name = 'Quarterly Sales Report', date_requested = '2022-09-30' WHERE report_id = 1;

UPDATE ad_hoc_reports SET report_date = '2022-08-01' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE report_access SET user_id = 1001, access_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE access_id = 2;
UPDATE ad_hoc_reports SET report_name = 'New Report Name', report_content = 'Updated Content' WHERE report_id = 1;
UPDATE report_access SET access_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = 100 AND report_id = 2;
UPDATE AdHocReports SET report_name='Updated Report 1', report_content='Updated content for Report 1' WHERE report_id=1;
UPDATE ReportStatistics SET downloads=10, views=50 WHERE report_id=2;
UPDATE AdHocReports SET report_name = 'Updated Report 1', report_content = 'New content for Report 1' WHERE report_id = 1
UPDATE ReportStatistics SET views = views + 10, downloads = downloads + 5 WHERE report_id = 2
